description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中央社会主义学院党组副书记、常务副院长，中华海外联谊会副秘书长，北京航空航天大学党委副书记、副校长，第十届全国政协委员。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group and Executive Vice President of the Central Institute of Socialism, Deputy Secretary-General of the China Overseas Friendship Association, Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee and Vice President of Beihang University, and a member of the 10th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，于泽荣是该国的政治人物。
description.en: A country in East Asia, of which Yu Zerong is a political figure.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的统一战线性质的政治学院，是中国民主党派和无党派人士的联合党校。于泽荣曾在此担任党组副书记、常务副院长。
description.en: A political academy of a united front nature led by the Chinese Communist Party, and a joint party school for democratic parties and non-partisans. Yu Zerong served as its Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group and Executive Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 全国性、联谊性、非营利性的社会团体，于泽荣曾担任该会副秘书长。
description.en: A national, friendship-based, non-profit social organization, where Yu Zerong served as Deputy Secretary-General.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十届全国委员会
en: 10th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的第十届会议，于泽荣是其委员。
description.en: The tenth session of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, of which Yu Zerong was a member.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，于泽荣是其党员。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China, of which Yu Zerong is a member.

en: The High School Affiliated to Peking University

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的一所中学，于泽荣是其校友。
description.en: A high school located in Beijing, of which Yu Zerong is an alumnus.

en: Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所大学，于泽荣是其校友，并曾担任该校党委副书记、副校长。
description.en: A university in Beijing, China, of which Yu Zerong is an alumnus and served as its Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee and Vice President.

position.zh-cn: 党组副书记、常务副院长
position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group, Executive Vice President

description.zh-cn: 根据Wikitext，于泽荣曾任中央社会主义学院党组副书记、常务副院长。
description.en: According to the Wikitext, Yu Zerong served as the Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group and Executive Vice President of the Central Institute of Socialism.

description.zh-cn: 根据Wikitext，于泽荣曾任中华海外联谊会副秘书长。
description.en: According to the Wikitext, Yu Zerong served as the Deputy Secretary-General of the China Overseas Friendship Association.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据Wikitext，于泽荣是第十届全国政协委员。
description.en: According to the Wikitext, Yu Zerong was a member of the 10th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“中国共产党党员”，于泽荣是中国共产党的成员。
description.en: According to the page category 'Members of the Communist Party of China', Yu Zerong is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“北京大学附属中学校友”，于泽荣是北京大学附属中学的校友。
description.en: According to the page category 'Alumni of The High School Affiliated to Peking University', Yu Zerong is an alumnus of The High School Affiliated to Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“北京航空学院校友”，于泽荣是北京航空学院（现北京航空航天大学）的校友。
description.en: According to the page category 'Alumni of Beijing Institute of Aeronautics', Yu Zerong is an alumnus of Beijing Institute of Aeronautics (now Beihang University).

position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee, Vice President

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类，于泽荣曾担任北京航空航天大学党委副书记和副校长。
description.en: According to the page categories, Yu Zerong served as Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee and Vice President of Beihang University.
